response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (20 years old)", "medium", "Youth can indicate impulsivity, but age alone is not a deterministic factor."],
    ["Gender (male)", "high", "Males statistically tend to have higher recidivism rates."],
    ["Race (Black)", "medium", "Race is a factor in some statistical models, but it should be interpreted with caution."],
    ["Criminal History (5 arrests with convictions)", "high", "A significant number of arrests and convictions strongly correlate with higher recidivism."],
    ["Physical Attributes (6'3\", 208 lbs)", "low", "Height and weight are not relevant predictors of criminal recidivism."],
    ["Marital Status (never married, living alone)", "high", "Lack of stable family relationships and social support can increase recidivism risk."],
    ["Education (high school diploma, not in college)", "medium", "Limited educational attainment may reduce employment opportunities, increasing risk."],
    ["Employment Status (no job in past year)", "high", "Lack of employment is closely linked to higher chances of recidivism."],
    ["Substance Use (no drugs used in past four years)", "low", "The absence of recent drug use reduces one major risk indicator."],
    ["Mental Health (occasional feelings of deep sadness)", "medium", "Indicators of depression can impact behavior, though not definitive for recidivism."],
    ["Family Background (grew up in a household of 4)", "low", "A typical household size does not strongly indicate risk."],
    ["Religious Beliefs (believes God influences his life)", "low", "Religion can serve as a protective factor, contributing to desistance."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 5 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 3 inches and weighs 208 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived in a household of size 4. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
